title: Did Muller Trump conclude that he had committed "no obstacle" in detecting the 2016 election?
subtitle: Special Adviser Robert Mueller testified before Congress in July 2019 about his report on whether the Russian government intervened in the US presidential election won by Donald Trump.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The President of the United States (Donald Trump) is right to say that the report of Special Adviser Robert Mueller on Russian intervention in the 2016 United States presidential election found "no obstruction of justice."
